Type.Name: UnmapEventHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void UnmapEventHandler(object o, UnmapEventArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed UnmapEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Event handler. Called whenever a widget is unmapped--- that is, whenever its window is hidden.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the UnmapEventHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the UnmapEventHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the UnmapEventHandler is removed from the event.
